comments.body: One of the greatest ideas I read on this website!Marble would be great for flooring and wallpapers were needed in the game from a long time and they will be a better substitute for banners!
Great!Where are you from?
read my mind.... Mojang should create this biome because it exists in real life. maybe there could be a new village also.
great idea, I think that rosemary shrubs + lavenders would great too to make the biome more unique
About the olive tree, I think that 3-4 blocks is too short, I think 6-7 blocks is better imo

to add on to this,
cypress trees, grows taller and thinner than the olive tree, the wood color is in between birch and oak color.

also a rare structure inspired by the Greek ruins made of quartz and marble can hold rare items in suspicious sand and gravel.
too op

What is? The Swarms of Quartzites? Those look overpowering. What if they could climb up blocks like spiders too? *Gulp* 
Having enough Quartz is not a problem, and the pillars of Quartz are pretty rare. Perhaps when you break some Quartz Blocks or Quartz Powder in this biome, Quartzites might come out like silverfish.

to prevent this from being too op I think that it should be, at MOST a 3x/z 1y and 2z/x chunks in size considering the new 3d biome gen. also the if the pillars gave 1-2 crystals per block this would also be a welcome nerf
Quartz is annoying running into when digging in the nether for ancient debris. I think NOBODY would complain about quartz only being found in a specific biome...

Maybe this biome could also be the only place to find other variations of quartz like Amethyst, Citrine, Parasiolite, Smoky Quartz, and Rose Quartz. Also, I think that the variations of quartz would also just be for building like normal Nether Quartz. Also, so the names of all the varieties could fit together, Nether Quartz could be renamed to White Nether Quartz. Also the rest of the quartz varieties would have Nether at the start of their name (Nether Amethyst, Nether Citrine, ect.).

Perhaps one new type of Quartz for this biome, but we don't need that many ores. What is SO OP about this? Perhaps if the Quartz Pillars were built out of a new Quartz Block or type of Quartz, this "OPness" of having more excessive Quartz could be limited.
I wasn't thinking Quartz would be eliminated in other areas of the nether (another comment), though cutting the Quartz found in other areas by like half might be good as long as xp given by Quartz is increased by around x2. Quartz in other biomes is needed for xp grinding, as its a great way to get xp (and should be made better)!

I had an idea to go along with the biome, The Silithops. Its name comes from Silica (an elemental compound found in quartz) and Lithops (a plant). A Silithops is a plant that is based off of the real world plant Lithops. Lithops is sometimes referred to as “The living rock” due to its rock like appearance. I thought that maybe this plant could be found in the more elevated parts of the quartz desert and come in all the colors of quartz that GeckoNova1021 suggested. Also, I think due to its quartz like properties, you would have to mine it to obtain it. Its purpose would only be for decoration because I cannot think of any use at the moment.
Heck yeah sounds legit!
I like this
I didn't realize this existed before posting mine, but maybe larger webs appearing rarely that are 2x2 or cocoons similar to my post?
This should be in the new update.
Since the player needs to be geared up to enter these areas, the biome should have loot that helps in the late game.
I know that everyone is wanting a cave update but I want an end update just as much
I legit made a bubble forest in my creative world in the end but it had a blue color scheme

I am also worried about the end gateways, but am upvoting anyway.

Maybe the sky could be a different color to the portals' blueish hue, or the portals could take on a different color, instead.
Perhaps it would be like the old pre 1.16 nether, but less chaotic, with more basic terrain generation, and no nether ore types.

Or maybe it could be something entirely different, like maybe they could add a nether boss that drops ancient debis or something super rare it would be a good way to level up faster and a challenge for the people who have completed the game several times, I mean if their gonna add this it would be a totally new world and most people would get bored if it were just the old nether before the new biomes
This seems like it would be awesome
Wither Skeleton Horse should leave fire particles while they run.
I like this idea. It should be pretty rare though.
Thanks for your info. that's kind of what I was going for, but I'll add that to be more specific. Thanks.
This is a very cool idea to have in the game and it make sense to have it rare and it add some cool new blocks to the game which I like.

A few problems I have with this:

  1. Don't expect to find food there; you should never eat glass. It will kill you.
  2. Leather is already a color-able armor.
  3. For skin designs, there is already alpha-layer compatibility for the outer skin layer, so this "glass effect" can already be done. (although not all websites with MC skin editors have this function, so it may take more effort)
  4. "Terran lenses" just sounds like a new type of X-ray cheat for multiplayer servers to worry about.

However, glass armor which will not give away your position (as much) when using invisibility could be neat. Just be careful not to drop your glass boots on your way downstairs. ☺
It would be interesting if Illusioners had a place here; maybe they could spawn around certain structures, similar to pillager outposts.

Something I'm worried about: In a world made completely out of glass, anything you build on it which isn't glass will look strange. If there are enough different colors of glass everywhere, the "mist effect" will make it appear more solid, but this also causes more lag.

Response to empty fire:

1 You can eat the crabs.

2 Have you ever seen anyone wearing leather armor to a fight? Glass armor is able to be used in actual combat.

3 While you can obtain special partly-transparent skins, your armor goes over these. Glass armor would allow you to show off your skin while fully geared up.

4 My idea for Terran Lenses is for them to render blocks seen through them transparent out to a distance of 8 (or so) meters. This allows you to see all of the blocks within this distance, so yes, it does function as an x-ray, but a very limited one. Given it's difficulty to obtain, I don't think multiplayer servers will have to "worry about" it.


Thanks for taking the time to read!
There could be mobs made of glass with their insides being shown, but they are made of crystals

I mean I kind of agree to this idea, but for 1 make it for more then just oculus, 2 dont make the whole world glass but maybe add the glass blocks to like some villages and generated houses, I mean if there where glass blocks like stairs, slabs, and few other blocks and have a bunch of colors for them, I think lots of builders could build a lot more structures and building using them.
I'd say to make it out of crying obsidian and make the portal itself blue, and only make the portal activate once both bosses have been defeated, as to prevent any early access to the end.

Hi there, This feedback is incomplete and not really useable by our team in its current form. Can you explain what you're looking for? Thanks, it will help us express your idea to the team in an actionable way.
its kind of sounds like the cold biomes we already have in the overworld but with more mobs.

I think this is a cool idea , I also believe that the end should be updated with new biomes,vegetation,mobs,and structures

I think the end is too simple, kill the endear dragon, explore the end city’s and get the elytra, then your never coming back to it, just to do some farms or get shulker boxes
Yessssssssss

We need the old world type back! It was a lot of fun, but they removed it. There was so much you can do with it, you could be as creative as you liked with it, and we shouldn't need to get a mod to play the old world type! Send this to your friends if you agree!
I agree!
We want old worlds back!
Bring back old worlds!
Bring old worlds back mojang i agree!
Yess I loved this feature it made me feel like one of those big YouTubers doing a one chuck challenge ❤️
No but honestly though I only found out today that they got removed, I thought that I had been unlucky in not seeing one in so long. PUT THEM BACK.

Magma ravines underwater are some of the coolest minecraft terrain generation I see in the Oceans. Everything from the bubble columns to the obsidian floor adds character to the Oceans which feel empty otherwise. PLEASE ADD THEM BACK.
Agreed, all while it should retain its barren, eerie vibe as the dimension was intended.

It would be interesting to see in minecraft different kind of biomes in the end. Cities with futuristic feel, some aurora blocks like there are already in some mods, new creatures either hostile or friendly, etc. Because for now, the end only has one purpose: defeat the dragon, some shulker boxes and elytra. There is nothing of interest besides those that can make people purposefully travel to the end biomes.
That logic doesn't apply to sheep in all other biomes. Pink sheep should remain a rare mystery.
Pink sheep should remain a rare mystery but there should be bigger chance of spawning in cherry groves biome.

Now that biome-dependent sheep color distributions have been announced, it would be a great time to revisit this suggestion.

It could be a good idea to apply this to flower forests as well, or even to give it sheep colors that don’t otherwise appear naturally such as orange, yellow, and light blue.
Would be a great place for a purple "wood" set, especially on the same rarity as the mushroom biome. With a mob that will "patrol" along light areas and growl or alarm at hostile mobs.

I have a similar suggestion where I fleshed out some additional details: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/18562074587533-Introducing-the-Dream-Dimension-A-Surreal-New-Experience-in-Minecraft
